responsibilities: Build impactful solutions that empower millions of users through Fintech applications.
Experiment with cutting-edge machine learning modeling techniques.
Work on both early-stage (0-1) and growth-stage (1-10) problems.
Develop AI/ML models through a full life cycle, from offline training to online serving and monitoring.
Collaborate with teams across Plaid to define the machine learning roadmap.
Dive deep into data and apply data-driven decisions in day-to-day work.
qualifications: Experience with state-of-the-art machine learning and modeling techniques.
Proficiency in natural language processing, anomaly detection, optimization, and time series forecasting.
Ability to design, build, and deploy scalable ML solutions and systems.
Strong coding skills, particularly with data infrastructure tools like Python, Spark, and Jupyter notebooks.
Ability to iterate independently using standard ML libraries.
analysis: The job involves building impactful solutions through Fintech applications and experimenting with machine learning modeling techniques. The responsibilities include developing AI/ML models through a full life cycle, which suggests a focus on machine learning but does not explicitly mention Generative AI or language models. The skills required include proficiency in natural language processing, which is related to language models, but it is not explicitly stated that the job involves working with Generative AI or LLMs. The focus seems to be on a broad range of machine learning techniques, including anomaly detection, optimization, and time series forecasting, rather than specifically on Generative AI or LLMs.
